project.description: build easy_access_client, easy_access_activator, weintek-p2p for cMT3000

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
cd ${WORKSPACE}/weintek-p2p cp config_linux.h config.h if [ ! -d "jenkins" ]; then mkdir jenkins fi cd jenkins
source /home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi
export BUILD_TYPE=Release export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/libweintek_stable_cMT3000/workspace export LIBWEINTEK_ROOT=${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/build-stable-branch cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${BUILD_TYPE} \ -DMODEL=E60 \ -DGOOGLE_BREAKPAD_DIR=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/google-breakpad \ -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${INSTALL_PREFIX} \ ..
cd client make VERBOSE=1 install
cd ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin #upx weintek-p2p

#!/bin/bash
cd ${WORKSPACE}/rma if [ ! -d "jenkins" ]; then mkdir jenkins fi cd jenkins
touch ${WORKSPACE}/rma/AuthClient/easy_access_client_manager.bin.cpp
source /home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi
export BUILD_TYPE=Release export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/libweintek_stable_cMT3000/workspace export LIBWEINTEK_ROOT=${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/build-stable-branch cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${BUILD_TYPE} \ -DMODEL=E60 \ -DGOOGLE_BREAKPAD_DIR=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/google-breakpad \ -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${INSTALL_PREFIX} \ -DCMAKE_INCLUDE_FLAG_CXX="-I/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/sysroots/armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi/usr/include/breakpad" \ ..
cd AuthClient rm -f easy_access_client_manager make VERBOSE=1 easy_access_client_manager strip easy_access_client_manager # upx easy_access_client_manager bin2cpp easy_access_client_manager cp easy_access_client_manager.bin.cpp ${WORKSPACE}/rma/AuthClient make VERBOSE=1 install/strip # make easy_access_client # strip easy_access_client # upx easy_access_client # cp easy_access_client ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin cd ../RemoteAccessActivator make VERBOSE=1 easy_access_activator strip easy_access_activator cp easy_access_activator ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin
cd ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin #upx easy_access_client /home/ci/work/crypto e easy_access_client easy_access_client.c30.${PARAM_EAC_VERSION}

cd ${WORKSPACE} export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/build-stable-branch rm -rf artifacts mkdir artifacts cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/easy_access_client* artifacts cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/easy_access_activator artifacts cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/weintek-p2p artifacts
